summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dashboard tabs patch. All requirements successfully implemented - tabs now function as internal dashboard views without navigation, New Appointment button visibility logic working correctly, and Coming Soon placeholders properly displayed.
passed_tests: DP Dashboard tab shows Coming Soon placeholder correctly
Customer Relations tab displays dashboard content with stats (Today Total, Pending Tomorrow, No-Show Rate, Recovered)
Customer Relations tab shows Pending Confirmations section with task data
Customer Relations tab displays Source Funnel (30 Days) data with booking metrics
Customer Relations tab shows Today by Branch breakdown
New Appointment button visible ONLY on Customer Relations tab (hidden on all other tabs)
New Appointment button hidden on DP Dashboard tab as expected
New Appointment button hidden on Parts tab as expected
New Appointment button hidden on Bodyshop and HR tabs as expected
New Appointment button navigation works correctly - redirects to /new-appointment
Parts tab shows Coming Soon placeholder with correct title
Bodyshop tab shows Coming Soon placeholder with correct title
HR tab shows Coming Soon placeholder with correct title
All tab clicks do NOT trigger page navigation - URL stays /dashboard
Tab switching changes content dynamically without URL changes
Dashboard tabs are internal views only (no navigation)
Tab visual states update correctly (active tab highlighted with black border)
Sidebar navigation remains independent and visible alongside dashboard tabs
